Package com.keyblock

Interface ClaimsRegistryInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    TransactionNotifierInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClaimsRegistryConnector, SimpleClaimsRegistryConnector
    public interface ClaimsRegistryInterface
extends TransactionNotifierInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Claim getClaim​(java.lang.String subjectAddress, java.lang.String claimId)
      Read a @com.keyblock.Claim from smart contract
      java.lang.String setClaimAsync​(java.lang.String subjectAddress, java.lang.String claimId, java.lang.String claimValue)
      Asynchronous call smart contract function SimpleClaimsRegistry.setClaim to create a new @com.keyblock.Claim and only send transaction.
      TransactionReceipt setClaimSync​(java.lang.String subjectAddress, java.lang.String claimId, java.lang.String claimValue)
      Synchronous call smart contract function SimpleClaimsRegistry.setClaim to create a new @com.keyblock.Claim and wait for result.
      TransactionReceipt waitForReceipt​(java.lang.String transactionHash)
      Wait for a transaction to be validated.

        getListeners, subscribe

    • Method Detail

      • getClaim

        Claim getClaim​(java.lang.String subjectAddress,
               java.lang.String claimId)
        Read a @com.keyblock.Claim from smart contract
        Parameters:
        subjectAddress - address of user
        claimId - key of @com.keyblock.Claim
        Returns:
        the @com.keyblock.Claim that represents the stored value, null il not found

      • setClaimSync

        TransactionReceipt setClaimSync​(java.lang.String subjectAddress,
                                java.lang.String claimId,
                                java.lang.String claimValue)
        Synchronous call smart contract function SimpleClaimsRegistry.setClaim to create a new @com.keyblock.Claim and wait for result.
        Parameters:
        subjectAddress - user address the @Claim is related to
        claimId - key of @com.keyblock.Claim to set
        claimValue - value of @com.keyblock.Claim to set
        Returns:
        the @com.keyblock.Claim created

      • setClaimAsync

        java.lang.String setClaimAsync​(java.lang.String subjectAddress,
                               java.lang.String claimId,
                               java.lang.String claimValue)
        Asynchronous call smart contract function SimpleClaimsRegistry.setClaim to create a new @com.keyblock.Claim and only send transaction.
        Parameters:
        subjectAddress - user address the @Claim is related to
        claimId - key of @com.keyblock.Claim to set
        claimValue - value of @com.keyblock.Claim to set
        Returns:
        the transaction hash

      • waitForReceipt

        TransactionReceipt waitForReceipt​(java.lang.String transactionHash)
        Wait for a transaction to be validated. The call is blocking until receipt is created.
        Parameters:
        transactionHash - the hash of transaction to wait for
        Returns:
        the org.web3j.protocol.core.methods.response.TransactionReceipt of given transaction hash
